column3: A special invitation to the Restuss Arts Jubilee.
Scholar Ingon Lakbo's response to Narmle Minister of Education Sindra Lintikoor's invitation to participate in a "Great Conversation" debate among Rori's philosophers.
Narmle Minister of Education Sindra Lintikoor's invitation to scholar Bieque Lozan-Lippid to participate in a "Great Conversation" debate among Rori's philosophers.

Restuss socialite Indintra Imbru Yerevan's suggestion to her friend, Briska Gil, to invite Narmle scholar Ingon Lakbo to a dinner party -- that happens to coincide with the previously scheduled "Great Conversation" debate among Rori's philosophers.

Restuss socialite Indintra Imbru Yerevan's invitation to Shaultra Loraweet to attend the "Great Conversation" debate among Rori's philosophers -- a debate that includes (not coincidentally) Loraweet's former sweetheart, philosopher Bieque Lozan-Lippid.
Selected Chadra Fan heart-splitter wailing serenades, intended for the Narmle Arts Gala run by Narmle's Arts Minister, Oxil Sarban.
A collection of individually carved dust grains from across the galaxy, intended for the Narmle Arts Gala run by Oxil Sarban, Arts Minister of Narmle on Rori.
Standard security encoding and command device issued to Warrant Officer Luhin Jinnor of Colonel Zarvold's Imperial Army battalion on Rori.
Merr-Sonn Munitions Class-A explosive device issued to personnel in Colonel Zarvold's Imperial Army battalion on Rori.
Painting by Gungan artist Odoof Grunda of Sidoras Bey sculpting a statue of the Emperor.
A list of finalists and their work for the judges of the Imperial Arts Grant competition at the Narmle Arts Gala on Rori.
The official announcement of the winner of an art competition held during the Arts Gala festival in Narmle on Rori.
An invitation to a dinner party from Ajuva Vanasterin
An order to purchase several paintings for Ajuva Vanasterin
The art holo centerpiece for the Restuss Arts Jubilee on Rori.
